name: Trippy World: Ascension
description:
Trippy World: Ascension

Designed a game in beta to compliment the project I value in the Solana space: Trippy World. 

Navigate your character into an endless platformer to arise from the wretches of the Non-Believers. Dodge away from toxic blue orbs and gather all the coins that you can! 

Who knows, there might be a bounty.
